QuestData.Title: Ghost Walker Post
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $c.$b$bIt is good to see that you still draw breath. The time has come for me to call upon your services.$b$bJust southwest of this glade stands Ghost Walker Post. There you will find a forsaken by the name of Maurin Bonesplitter.$b$bHe may have a solution for one of the problems we face here.$b$bSpeak with him and do what you can to assist him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Karnum Marshweaver wants you to speak with Maurin Bonesplitter.
QuestData.RewardText: Greetings, $c.$b$bIt is good that you have finally arrived....
